extendedInfo.description: NO TIME to get fluent? Need the basics now? uTalk gives you the key words you need and a fast, scientific way of remembering them. Native speakers * Recording and playback * Memorable images * Fun quizzes * Really rewarding points system! "Fun intelligent interactive learning games. Worth the money." 5 Stars. MarPixel.

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: This is the best app for any seSotho learner. It only crashes sometimes on the galaxy SII with android 4.0.3 but in 4.0.4 it is fixed. Great app, worth it\'s price!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome on Galaxy Note
reviews.comment: Thanks for developing this amazing app, works brilliantly, now a case to see if I can keep up and learn the language in mind.
reviews.author: A Google User
